Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Indigo Liverpool City Centre, you'll be centrally located in Liverpool, steps from Liverpool Town Hall and minutes from Royal Liver Building. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cunard Building and Port of Liverpool Building.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 151 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Pay movies and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center or make use of other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-out.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Hotel Indigo Liverpool City Centre, you'll be centrally located in Liverpool, steps from Liverpool Town Hall and minutes from Royal Liver Building. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cunard Building and Port of Liverpool Building.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Liverpool Town Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Liver Building - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Cunard Building - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Port of Liverpool Building - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Cavern Club - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Liverpool - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Liverpool ONE - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Liverpool National Conservation Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Court Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Merseyside Maritime Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
International Slavery Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Liverpool Playhouse - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
St John's Beacon - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Neptune Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Clayton Square Shopping Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Indigo Liverpool City Centre is Liverpool (LPL-John Lennon) - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
